episodes.title: Part 1: Days 1-7
episodes.description: The Beatles arrive at Twickenham Studios and have three weeks to complete 14 new songs and a live show.

episodes.title: Part 2: Days 8-16
episodes.description: John, Paul and Ringo meet with George following his walkout and move the session to Apple Studios.

episodes.title: Part 3: Days 17-22
episodes.description: The Beatles must decide if they will perform live for the first time in more than two years.
